revisionDesc.tei:change: Added references to VIAF IDs to persNames without such references based on persons mentioned in /Volumes/Dessau HD/BachUni/BachBibliothek/GitHub/OpenArabicPE/digital-mawaqif/tei/entities_master.TEIP5.xml but not previously present in this master file.
Corrected biblStruct by moving all biblScope from imprint to monogr and by converting all n to from and towith identical values.
revisionDesc.change: Added automated xml:ids for every element that is a descendant of tei:textand had no existing xml:idfollowing the pattern "name()_generate-id()"
revisionDesc.tei:change: Added the xml:lang attribute to all nodes that lacked this attribute. The value is based on the closest ancestor.
revisionDesc.change: Created this TEI P5 file by automatic conversion of the table of content from HTML available at archive.sakhrit.co and adding a computed sequence of facsimiles linking to the same website.
